name: Trustworthy Machine Learning
reason: This course aligns directly with the student's background in software engineering and experience with AI tools and trustworthy ML, enhancing their technical knowledge in AI.

name: Introduction to Cloud Computing
reason: Given the student's interest in deepening their technical knowledge, particularly in cloud computing, this course with its hands-on programming assignments is highly relevant.

name: Special Topics in Software Systems: Artificial Intelligence
reason: This course offers an exploration of AI, which is pertinent to the student's job and interests, and allows for hands-on research and presentations.

name: Computers and Society
reason: This course will help the student develop their business acumen by understanding the ethical and societal impacts of computing, including AI, which is central to their interests and career.

name: Understanding Engineering Practice: From Design to Entrepreneurship
reason: While this course is less technical, it will help the student in expanding their business acumen by covering the nature of engineering practice from design to entrepreneurship.
